name: Sparkk
overview: The secret formula of Sparkk has been stolen and as the hero you are, you leave your town and enter the magic castle when the monster is out for a picnic. You discover that the formula is hidden in the basement somewhere, and this is where the game starts. Watch out. The enemy are not the small monsters, trying to bring down your energy, but the time! Good luck, you will need a lot of it! Published as La Formula in Italy in both Supplementi Edigamma/pubblirome - big 100 (1987) and Super C64 e C128 n.29 (dicembre 1988).
